overview: A widower (David Westhead) returns home after his wifeâ€™s cremation to find his house filled with memories of their life together, yet tragically empty. He finds some old film reels from their youth packed away of his wife teaching him how to dance a waltz. He decides to film himself dancing the counter part and then project the two films on top of each other, so that he and his wife are once again side by side.
title: Dust to Dust
